soot.dexpler

Class DexBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.dexpler.DexBody

  • public class DexBody
extends java.lang.Object
    A DexBody contains the code of a DexMethod and is used as a wrapper around JimpleBody in the jimplification process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DexBody(DexFile dexFile, Method method, RefType declaringClassType)

        public Local getRegisterLocal(int num)
                       throws InvalidDalvikBytecodeException

      • instructionsBefore

        public java.util.List<DexlibAbstractInstruction> instructionsBefore(DexlibAbstractInstruction instruction)
        Return the instructions that appear (lexically) before the given instruction. The instruction immediately before the given is the first instruction and so on.
        Parameters:
        instruction - the instruction which successors will be returned.
